title: Sawdust and Tinsel (restored, colorized, Eng sub) (1953, Dir: Ingmar Bergman, drama, imdb score: 7.5)

sources.title: Sawdust and Tinsel (restored, colorized, Eng sub) (1953, Dir: Ingmar Bergman, drama, imdb score: 7.5)
sources.description: Sawdust and Tinsel (Swedish: Gycklarnas afton , lit. 'The Evening of the Jesters') is a 1953 Swedish drama film directed by Ingmar Bergman.
